attributes.action: Make sure all Bicycles are fitted with Lights as standard prior to sale
attributes.background: Too many cyclists are on the roads  and pavements in dark clothing and no lights on there Bicycles ,  We need lights fitted as a standard item prior to sale

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of bike manufacturers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for this to be required by law, if that's what you would like to happen.
